bug.short_desc: [GTK3.20] plenty of gtk warnings in logs

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: I have loads of gtk warnings that appear to originate in firefox in the logs:
Mar 04 09:01:58 ntb-work /usr/libexec/gdm-x-session[1677]: (firefox:2791): Gtk-WARNING **: State 0 for GtkEntry 0x7f27c4412a50 doesn't match state 128 set via gtk_style_context_set_state () Mar 04
